member.name: M:datagen.generator.random(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns a random string from the given array of strings

member.name: M:datagen.generator.random(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Returns a random integer from the given array of integers

member.name: M:datagen.generator.random``1(``0[])
member.summary: Returns a random item T from the given array of items T

member.name: M:datagen.generator.date(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns date in a range between the dates (specified as a string)

member.name: M:datagen.generator.date(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Returns date between the range specified by min and max

member.name: M:datagen.generator.integer(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an integer between the range specified by min and max
